metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36766 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.8.6.drivers/media/cec/core/cec-api.c leaks one byte of kernel memory onspecific hardware to unprivileged users, because of directly assigninglog_addrs with a hole in the struct.

criterions.comment: linux-aws package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needs-triage').
linux-lowlatency package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-oracle package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-raspi package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-starfive package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
